title: Collaborative Learning-Based Classroom Improvement Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational educational theory and language instruction experience
context.additional_context: A practice-centered training course for pre-service and in-service teachers to design and implement collaborative learning strategies in VR simulation environments.

learning_goals: Participants can establish three or more specific implementation plans when designing collaborative learning activities incorporating quality management concepts
Participants can implement language education collaborative learning scenarios in simulation/VR environments with over 80% accuracy
Participants can develop strategies to improve learning effectiveness by 15% or more through peer feedback and self-assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
